DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim Healthy Bodies , Healthy Hearts research study promote physical activity woman age 45-65 year promote reduce risk cardiovascular disease . The investigator conduct intervention 12 week promote physical activity support group , group exercise session information give baseline appointment . Participants randomly assign group .
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Bodies , Healthy Hearts : A Physical Activity Intervention Trial
DOC.criteria: Not currently exercise least 100 minute per week Have Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 25 great Has physician one three participate practice Not able walk 1/2 mile 1 flight stair without assistance another person assistive device
